snippet.title: Slitherine Next 2024 | Starship Troopers: Terran Command - Territory mode
snippet.description:
Territory Mode offers a fresh gameplay experience designed specifically for replayability.
A variety of exclusive maps has been created exclusively for Territory Mode, where you can choose new battle groups and assemble your forces deploying units from the base game and any DLCs you own.

In this mode, the Federation and Arachnids battle fiercely over Territory Points: key locations on the map that provide the resources necessary to recruit units, recover from losses, and unlock new technologies.
Capture your territory and beware of the Bugs counterattacks.

🎮 Wishlist now on Steam ➡️ http://steam.gs/l/kpa12
💬 Join the Discord Server ➡️ https://discord.gg/gAwt99fpmP
🦎 More info on Slitherine ➡️ https://www.slitherine.com/game/starship-troopers-terran-command
